name: Untitled (itch) (CashewTheCat)
description:
I decided a few weeks ago to start making small games which I can actually finish and release. This is the first game. 

It features decent controls, some weird minimalistic graphics, and some awful level design.

Press A/B/X/Y or space to jump. Jump while you're on the ceiling to jump down. Jump while on a wall to jump off. Keep your momentum and get a high score.

Hope it works, hope you enjoy.

Sorry in advance for any resolution-related scaling issues. Patch for that soon.
